      • calculateValues

        public void calculateValues(AbstractAutomatedAgent abstractAgent,
                            int nCurrentTurn)
        Calculate utility value, best agreement and worse agreement at time nTimePeriod. A recursive function for calculating all combination of issues.
        Parameters:
        nTimePeriod - - the time period for the agreement
